mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tasks_chofer_delivery ( renta_id, status_almacen_tasks_catalog_id, attend_almacen_tasks_type_catalog_id, chofer_id, system_message, created_at, updated_at, fg_active ) VALUES ( #{renta.rentaId}, #{statusAlmacenTaskCatalogVO.id}, #{attendAlmacenTaskTypeCatalogVO.id}, #{chofer.usuarioId}, #{systemMessage}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{fgActive} )
